description:
Apple has begun contributing official support for its Vision Pro headset to the popular Godot game engine. Ricardo Sanchez-Saez, a senior iOS engineer working on Apple’s visionOS team, announced the effort via a pull request (PR) submitted to the Godot project on GitHub. This first contribution lays the foundational groundwork for running Godot applications natively... Read more »

The post Apple adds official Vision Pro support to Godot game engine appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Apple adds official Vision Pro support to Godot game engine
